content: {"name": "Lorraine\u2019s Soup Kitchen and Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Chickopee residents", "email": "", "url": "", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "170 Pendexter Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Chicopee", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "01013", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.1754507, "longitude": -72.6149552}, "phones": [{"number": "(413) 592-9528", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Emergency food available on an as-needed basis."}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
